website_summaries.verdict: One of the highest-rated money clip wallets available for purchase, this top-quality product impresses all around.
pros: Built-in RFID blocking technology for card protection
ID is immediately visible for fast access
Includes a smart-pull tab for cards that are hard to reach
cons: Money clip is not designed to hold heavy amounts of cash at one time

customer_reviews.title: Started falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Great looking wallet, seemed pretty solid until the seam around the license frame came loose and tore out. Update 5/22/18 the wallet finally came apart completely. Junk. The manufacturer emailed me telling me they'd rectify the problem but they refused to, and they asked me numerous times to update my review which I won't do because the item is junk and they did nothing to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Thaddeus Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Not RFID
customer_reviews.text: Sleek looking wallet but it’s NOT RFID... if I’m able to scan my badge at work WITHOUT opening the wallet and the door magically opens, I’m afraid to know what would happen if someone tried to scan my debit cards. I just need it to do what it says it would and it doesn’t. I hate to leave a bad review but don’t waste your money until they fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Mateen

customer_reviews.title: The item looks just like the photo and I'm impressed with the quality of ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wallet for 2 weeks now. The item looks just like the photo and I'm impressed with the quality of the stitching as well as the leather itself. I have some small bills, 1 card in the easy access slot, 3 cards behind my license, 4 in the tab slot, and 5 total in the 2 slots across from my license. I'd definitely buy again (but hope I won't need to for awhile)!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Basics Wallet + Billfold
customer_reviews.text: Here's my wallet journey that got me to this. I started with a regular bifold that everyone starts off with. Then it got too bulky. Then I started looking intl minimalist wallets. Many of them were too minimalist in utility that made their usage cumbersome. I really likes the Basics wallet due to its draw strap that bulls out the card but the pocket for cash required folding bills twice to fit in. This was the problem with most minimalist wallets. This wallet solved the problem. It has a billfold, has a slot of drivers license, a draw strap, and an extra slot for the main card.
customer_reviews.author: Sethel Lawn

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for making such a great wallet that is compact
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for making such a great wallet that is compact, functional and durable. I love the wallet and have been showing all my friends how great it is. Unfortunately my dog loved the wallet as much as I did. See photos of what happened. Given that she's a 80# lab who loves to chew, the wallet held up very well and protected my credit cards and drivers license. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money u pay
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband, it looked all good but after using for a month it started to look so worn out and the credit card pocket was so loose that every time my husband tried to take his wallet out cards started falling out if it. will defenately not recommend wasting money on this when you can get so many other options on amazon for lesser price
customer_reviews.author: Dreamzunlimited

customer_reviews.title: CREDIT CARDS FALLING OUT!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to love this wallet but after 5 months the leather stretched and the credit cards were falling out all the time. They replaced it and I had the same problem again. A contacted them again and they said we cannot replace the wallet again. I gave them a chance but they would not replace. Wasted my money on this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: BRAD "It is what it is!"

customer_reviews.title: It was great, until day 2 when it started falling apart....
customer_reviews.text: The wallet looks great, I got the Texas brown. The leather looks and feels good. I think it has a good amount of card slots for a minimalist wallet. The money clips works great as well! HOWEVER, on the day of using the wallet, I had to pull my ID out and this happened. The seams holding the cloth under the ID slot came completely out. Now the cloth is bunched up in the ID slot rendering it completely useless and leaving me very disappointed. Hopefully, SERMAN BRANDS will make this right.
customer_reviews.author: bman

customer_reviews.title: What a score!
customer_reviews.text: a SOLID WIN! My husband has always had major wallet issues. Wallet too small. Wallet too big. This wallet is just right! He loves the size and features! It is also a very nice looking wallet. The brown is beautiful and doesn't look like an old man's wallet. Classy yet hip! And the quality is awesome! If you are looking for a slim wallet with a lot of functionality, buy this NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Wigner

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wallet ever!
customer_reviews.text: What a cool wallet! It has lots of smart storage, including the pull-tab that displays all of your grouping of credit cards in the side slot. All of the other cards have access slots to easily slide out the card from their sleeve. Those along with the built-in RFID blocking, along with a slim physical design and top-quality leather make this one of the best wallets I've ever had the pleasure of owning.
customer_reviews.author: dpMPLS

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and has great crafstmanship - except for the dye
customer_reviews.text: The dye rubs off on everything. I literally can't put anything in this wallet without the color rubbing off on it. Why am I writing this response so long after purchase? I figured this would be like many wallets that have this issue where the problem would get better with time. Not in this case. It's ruined checks, notes, gotten insurance cards to look like they've been through some sort of natural disaster ridden area after having only been in the slot for a day or two.. Great design and durability, but the dye is just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: new england guy

customer_reviews.title: Received a Used Wallet
customer_reviews.text: The wallet I received is used. It has credit card imprints in the leather and even had a credit card receipt left in it from the previous owner. I received the wallet as a birthday present that I opened last night. I didn't get a chance to double check last night, but I'm not even sure it is the model I ordered (seemed too big). It will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Company Unresponsive -  NO HASSLE MONEY BACK GUARANTEE ?
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I really wanted this wallet to work well but the money clip just made the wallet messy and inefficient to get your bills quickly without having to take all of them out each time you need one. I reached out to the company through their website about their guarantee to ask for an exchange for the same wallet with the bill holder rather than the clip and received no response. The wallet is well made and outside of the clip being a pain everything else works. It is disappointing the company is being unresponsive and not following up on their NO HASSLE MONEY BACK GUARANTEE.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S. Preston Esq. III

customer_reviews.title: Holds quite a bit for small size
customer_reviews.text: First off lets say. I was still carrying a traditional bilfold. You know. The one that gets so fat that you sit higher on one side. So far I really like it. I have drivers license, club ID, 4 credit cards and cash. Not bulky at all. Do not know about the RFID yet. Will see as I carry it more. I will say it fits well in my front short pocket.
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking.  This is the one.  It will even hold a thin TILE in a slot.
customer_reviews.text: This is the one. I'm normally not that into wallets. But after you start accumulating cards, carrying less cash and learn of the RFID issues, it was time to start the search. I wanted a much thinner profile than my previous wallet and this fit the bill perfectly. They design is perfect between recognizing the card you use most on the outside with an easy thumb slide, to a thicker pocket with a pull tab for those less used. Cash is held in the middle by a pressure clip and while I don't carry a lot of cash, ten bills is no problem. Would easily buy again and highly recommend to anyone looking to downsize.
customer_reviews.author: D. Couse

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WALLET!! Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this wallet! I have been searching for a new wallet for quite sometime. I am pretty picky and I do a lot of research to make sure I don't purchase something poorly made. This is exactly what I wanted. It is nice and slim but still fits everything I need. The quality is top notch. Packaging was nice too. I was also pleased to see that you get a 12 month warranty. That is pretty rare. Overall great product! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: I looked at a LOT of wallets before getting this one
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I've had it for only a couple of hours, but it is exactly as described, nice leather, holds all the cards my bulky old wallet held, my license is in a place I can get to... and I have a couple dozen bills inserted under the "hook" and they're held securely and easy to reach. I really like that it's comfortable in my front pocket. Pull the little tab, and three credit cards pop out. turn it over, and I can use my thumb to eject my grocery store loyalty card and my medical insurance card is tucked in the inside behind the bills.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Reinhart

customer_reviews.title: Great slim wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Got this wallet hoping to slim down the hulking wallet that I was carrying around. I admit that this wallet does make you make some choices about which cards you really need to carry around but that is not a bad thing. The money clip and the tab that pulls out the cards are great features. I am already considering buying a second wallet so that I have it on hand just in case I need another one in a few years. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Frzrburn

customer_reviews.title: Sherman brand!
customer_reviews.text: Well I'll give it 5 stars based on my initial thoughts. I've put everything in it that I need and it fits great. Love the color, texture and smell of the leather. Feels and appears to be high quality; looks to be put together well. The easy access tab works as described. Packaging was nice also. I think this wallet will last a long time; I'm looking forward to breaking it in. I believe it is definitely worth buying if you're considering. It's worth more than $29 for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Corrao

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a new wallet and frankly was tired of carrying around a bulky wallet. It was time to go minimalist. I did quite a bit of research before I decided to purchase this one. It had the most features that I was looking for in one wallet. When I got it and inspected it I was very pleased. The only sort of negative for me was that I wish the leather was a darker shade of brown. Other than that this is the perfect wallet for me and I hope to have it for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Big Hen

customer_reviews.title: would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: The leather scratches immediately, its to thin to get anything in and the closure looks like a ribbon and its a pain to get it into its opening. In short, its not worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Nikolaus

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is minimalist but has room for all of the essentials. Great for front pocket or even shirt pocket. I was skeptical about the pull out tab to access the multiple credit card pocket, but it works great. I was also unsure about the money clip, but it works extremely well given the limited amount of cash I carry anyway. My only complaint is the leather comes rough, scratchy, worn looking and marks very easily. It is not polished or smooth and soft. For that reason I had to give it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: RJST12

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful functionality
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed when I got mine is that it was as slim as promised. Brown leather is very nice, and you can put a little moisturizer (very little) to get rid of scratches caused by daily use if you mind about that. I actually like the look. I have never been complimented over a wallet until now. Kind of weird since it’s just a wallet, but it really stands out as soon as you take it out. I have 8 cards in the wallet, and could fit another two, and you can add a few bills without making it bulky. Regarding RFID blocking, can’t really say. I want to trust it works. This wallet screams High Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto

customer_reviews.title: Compact size and easy acess, with a money clip!  Best of all worlds.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very difficult time finding a compact wallet that will provide a window compartment, and provide room for 2 medical cards, 4 Credit/Debit cards, and 3-4 other "shopping" cards, and still be a useable wallet. This product, so far, is proving to be the best available that I've been able to find. As a side note, when I manage to find one of these, with a money clip, that meets my needs, they are always a "Brand" label, not the "Swap Meet/Marketplace" product that is commonly available. I will likely purchase another and put it away for the future, easier than hoping to find it available then.
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: interior cloth dividers seperating
customer_reviews.text: The leather part of the wallet is solid but after only a few months of use the interior dividers have become unattached from the wallet and have rendered the pockets unusable without doing damage to the wallet. This is poor craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Vish

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic, works amazing, my husband’s back hurts less from not having bulky wallet anymore
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it, my mother-in-law was even impressed by it. Every time he goes to pay for something and they see him easily without the card he uses the most people are impressed. The wallet he used before was three times as thick this one allows him to carry everything he needs but he can barely feel it in his pocket. No complaints whatsoever, I would buy this as a gift for any man in my famil I would buy this as a gift for anyone Feeling confident that they would like it... Make sure they watch the video since men don’t read instructions... My husband said that not me!
customer_reviews.author: Erin B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a slim wallet for a very long time, and I’ve had several over the last few years, but they never lasted very long. This wallet is different, both in quality and looks. I carry several cards and IDs with me, and I’m able to put them all in this wallet without any issues. The wallet itself looks very nice, and the brown leather material is very nice. The clip inside can hold several bills without making the wallet seem bulky. If you’re looking for a great slim wallet, at an amazing price, do yourself a favor and buy this one. Their warranty is very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. VBOS

customer_reviews.title: Holds money while, easy to get cards out, and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this money clip. I am not a fan of the magnet money clip and always had a metal clip attached to a leather pouch. This money clip has a good way of holding money and a good way to get cards in and out of small pockets the main pocket has a strap that when you pull on it pulls all the cards right up. Very easy access. I probably have six cards total in there and it would be tight to fit more, but the money clip itself is great and comfortable. I'd get it again!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Best buy in quality, style  and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Super slim compact wallet. Not the typical wallet yet perfect amount of slots to hold the credit cards used, easy access to retrieve them. ID compartment allows easy demonstration of full ID information . This was a gift for my Hubby on Father's Day. He loves it. Nice fancy packaging The leather scent quickly noticed when opened. Care instructions is going to help, the leather does easily imprint to touch however this adds character to the leather itself. He is happy.
customer_reviews.author: MSA

customer_reviews.title: This wallet is a winner...thank you!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is super! I purchased this wallet for my father who has reduced mobility and strength in his hands and fingers. I was after a beautiful slimline, leather wallet that would also offer easy accessibility to and from his pocket as well as retrieving credit cards and money. This fit the bill wonderfully. He is delighted with the ease of access. The strap not only provides easy credit card access but helps with retrieving the wallet from his pocket. The money clip keeps his cash in the front...so no more searching in his wallet. The finger window makes other cards, etc easily available. A great wallet for anyone...but with features that can help those with physical hand/ finger challenges.
customer_reviews.author: charleigh

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and practical wallet fills the bill!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been looking for a back pocket wallet that held cards vertically to help keep them from sliding out when taking the wallet out of his pocket. This was the answer in a slim profile. Having a dedicated, easy to access slot for his debit card is a great plus. The interior money clip is practical since he rarely carries much cash. Workmanship is gorgeous, the packaging makes for an elegant gift, and overall i'm really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Snider

customer_reviews.title: 5 of 5 stars would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and even better customer service. I had a minor issue but SB took care of it no questions asked. So far my wallet is holding up and looks great. Don't be alarmed if you see a few minor blemishes as this is the characteristic of the leather. The oils from your hands will blend in any imperfections over time. As far as functionality, I couldn't have asked for anything different. I was skeptical at first of having to pull out an entire group of credit cards at one time vs traditional 1 card at a time. 5 of 5 stars would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Great! Rugged! Awesome quality!
customer_reviews.text: Best wallet I have ever had! I was looking for something that not only could help me slim down my bulky wallet. But something that also incorporated some good RFID blocking. I for sure found that in this wallet. Going on 6 months with this wallet and no issues. All card slots are tight l, and the pull out band still works flawlessly. Not sure what others were doing to it, to make it break. But I’m very hard on my wallets and this has done great!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was having some back issues and he contributed it to sitting on a wallet in his back pocket while driving. So, I saw this front pocket wallet and decided to give it a try. The quality is excellent for the price, the leather is soft and high quality. He has had it for two months and it has held up without any concern. It fits everything that he needs, a few cards and a good amt of paper money. It is not bulky and fits easily in his front pocket. I would for sure recommend this wallet! When this one wears out will probably buy him another of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nursejayne

customer_reviews.title: Serman Brands  RFID Blocking Slim Bifold Genuine Leather Minimalist Front Pocket Wallets for Men
customer_reviews.text: I received my new minimalist wallet from Serman Brands about a week ago. The only thing that I am wondering about is why I didn't try this a long time ago! Terrific design and just enough spaces for credit/insurance cards + a nice money clip. Leather quality ( I selected Texas Brown leather) seems to be good. I compared it to other minimalist wallets and found this to offer the ability to carry a few more cards while still being svelte. I particularly like the space for my most used CC and the window slot for my DL. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: hi-fi_steve

customer_reviews.title: Best Wallet I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write Amazon reviews, but this wallet exceeded my expectations. The leather is high quality and not a cheap Chinese knock off. The pull tab for your cards is life changing (I can fit 2 cards). The money clip is perfect. The ID holder has a fabric backing that makes it easy to slide your ID in and out. I'll never go back to a regular wallet. p.s. The Serman Brands website has lots more wallet options. I didn't know this until I went their to register my warranty. Check it out before making a decision.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha Kenny Wun

customer_reviews.title: New Model is a Step Down
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my "SimpacX" wallet of the same style(same company, different name?). It lost quality in the following places: The missing retracting pulltab for primary card. The previous model had a elastic attachment to the pulltab that kept it retracted after being pulled. The clear plastic pocket used to open from the outside, but now opens from the inside. Opening from the middle of the wallet makes it much more difficult to pull items out of it, or add to them.
customer_reviews.author: kRiStOf

customer_reviews.title: Great little front pocket wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Really liking this so far. Great quality build and nice rugged looks. I was using one of the carbon fiber wallets and I liked it too but wanted something that is easier is get my cards out of without having to take all out at the same time. This wallet does that and it looks good while doing it. Fits easy in my pocket and has a texture that will keep it from sliding and falling out. If you're on the fence, go for it. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Scott The Wolf Tamer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: My traditional bifold wallet was wearing out and my cards weren't being held securely anymore. I don't carry a lot of cash usually, so a large pocket for cash wasn't a requirement. I liked the features of this and the reduced capacity and decided to give it a try. I'm glad I did because it's perfect for my uses. It holds the 4 cards I use in a convenient and minimal package. The cash clip is great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wallet I have had so far! I simply love it and I love the way it doesn't increase in size with the more cards stuffed into it like I worried it would. My only small complaint is just me being super picky about wrinkles in money which isn't a concern to others. If you don't smooth the money out before closing the wallet they get all wrinkled and folded so that is the only thing I say watch out for. Also! The money clip comes out if you don't want it in there.
customer_reviews.author: Deary

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The best wallet I’ve owned. I’ve had it for close to a year now & it’s starting to fill up with miscellaneous business cards now so it has some bulk. It started out very slim & minimal, could be carried in front pocket. Defitely love the tab that you can pull to expose cards on the back side. Only downfall is that with the new debit/credit cards the chip is exposed when using the single slot. I simply flipped my card over to resolve this.
customer_reviews.author: Coy

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this wallet. I originally purchased another on Amazon that after a few days I questioned the durability of it. This wallet is great. I dont see bug bites on the leather as another reviewer noticed. The leather is thick. A bit thicker then o thought it would be. Probably because of the rfid blocker. The function of the wallet is great. It has a great feel to it. So far. I love it. Will update review later if things change.
customer_reviews.author: J. Talbert

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and very efficient in space used. The cards stay securely secured, and the bills too. The billls are easy to take out and back in, there is a quick way out for the card you use the most. After a few months of use the leather wrapping the cards securely has started to loose up and the cards are not as tight in it.. but so far, the cards are not falling out when I hold the wallet upside down. That is why I did not put 5 stars. It is still an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel P.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lasts
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I've had it for several years now, and it's still holding up like a champ. I bring it with me everywhere i go. The money clip works well, never had bills go missing or anything. I place my everyday credit card in the outermost slide-pocket and love its ease of access. The card is secure in that pocket too, so i never worry about it falling out either. This goes for all of the pockets in the wallet. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Worth taking the time to write a review.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing quality and well worth the cost. I frequently order items on Amazon but rarely ever take the time to write a review. I made an exception for this wallet because I simply love it and I really couldn't decide if I wanted to pay more than other similar wallets. With that extra cost and you get quality. I love the way it feels in either my front or back pocket. I also comfortably carry around 8 cards in it with probably 1/3 of the bulk of my old wallet. The pull tab is down right nifty! I'd strongly recommend this to anyone looking for a thinner wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: My first time buying clip wallet
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of this wallet ! slim and small size with nice looking if you usually walk with 5 cards maximum and a lil bit cash .. then it's great pick for you but to be honest after i use this wallet for a year leather and color ruined a lil bit .. so i think this wallet not gonna last for more 2 years !! at the end not bad deal with that price and i couldn't find something better in amazon
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Qasem

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet for those who want a minimalist wallet, but with the features of a full size wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet so far! Seems sturdy and color (Texas brown) looks great. Not the slimmest wallet if you're looking for a minimalist wallet, but it's a great middlepoint between a full size wallet and a minimalist. All the compartments are great and the pocket clip seems like it will hold up for a while. The only thing i'm worried about is the pull tab. It's thin so I'm afraid of it ripping/coming apart, but if it's anything like the rest of the wallet, it should hold up until it's time to get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet. At first I was concerned about it fitting all my basics in there but it’s perfect. The best part is I can’t stuff any more stuff in it. I had 17 to 20 bills in the money clip and didn’t really notice any added bulkiness. My only complaint is that the card reader at work won’t scan my ID badge through it so I have to take it out. But that’s just the wallet doing its job so I’ll deal with it. Great wallet, very happy with it and will be buying another when it's time to replace it.

customer_reviews.title: very compact which is nice - but that does come at the cost of ...
customer_reviews.text: Spouse wanted a new wallet, so we got this one. Very, very compact which is nice - but that does come at the cost of losing a lot of card space. If you've got more than like 5 or 6 cards that you carry, it gets very tight. But it's super convenient, the little tab to pull a card out is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great minimalist wallet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this wallet for about a week now and I love it. I love the smart strap that helps easily pull out my favorite card. The wallet is small but can carry a lot of cards and has a money clip as well. Its a drastic difference from my thick old wallet that I was using before buying this one. I'll probably buy another one for my brother for xmas, and will definitely buy another one for me when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Quality compact wallet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wallet based on previous reviews and was extremely satisfied with my purchase. It holds your cards well and fits comfortably in your front pants pocket. It it well designed and made of quality leather. The wallet on the left is my traditional black wallet and the brown wallet is my new wallet
customer_reviews.author: Ernie B

customer_reviews.title: Cards are easy to get out and use...
customer_reviews.text: Very good slimline/front pocket wallet. The outer thumb extract card pocket holds 3 non-embossed credit cards easily and they slide out with no issues even though they are firmly held in the wallet. The tab-extract pocket also works well, the ribbon that pulls up on the cards looks like a sturdy nylon of some sort. I've got 10 cards and an DL in the wallet and it is still quite flat.
customer_reviews.author: John in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during a flash sale for cheap so I was actually surprised by the quality. It is nice leather and perfect for my needs. It holds a lot of cards without being to thick, and the money clip on the inside is something I've never seen before. I got the Texas Brown and I love the look. The only downside I could see for some is that it shows scratches very easily. I actually don't mind it though. Very happy with the purchase,. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A quality product
customer_reviews.text: A high quality and well engineered wallet. Plenty of room for IDs and several credit cards in addition to a money clip that secures folding money, yet it still fits smoothly in a front pocket. There is a pull strap that easily accesses frequently used cards. The added security of RFID blocking is an important and comforting plus.
customer_reviews.author: RevBill60

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wallet for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing wallet!! The quality and convenience are top notch. I have carried the card holder types with magnetic money clips for years. I found I needed a bit more card space but did not want a full size bifold. This is an excellent middle ground. Large enough for all of my cards. Still has an id display window and on as an extra bonus the money is clipped inside so that I don't have to show my bills when pulling a card out. Great wallet, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Monty H.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I'm about 3 months in with this new wallet, and I love it. The slim design forced me to get rid of old junk that I haven't used in years, and limits me to only the necessities plus a few more. The money clip isn't super tight, I thought if I had only a bill or two in there they might slip out, but that hasn't been the case. And the pull out feature for those seldom-used cards is a cool party trick, but really quite functional. As for the RFID blocking function, I have no way of telling if that works or not, so there's that.
customer_reviews.author: Your Anonymous Online Friend

customer_reviews.title: I never place bill in my old wallet but I did collect useless business cards and store shopping cards
customer_reviews.text: I had been hesitant about switching my big bulky George Kastanza wallet to these new flat ones. I never place bill in my old wallet but I did collect useless business cards and store shopping cards. This wallet has a bunch of room and although is doesn't appear to the slot with the nifty pull strap means you can cram a lot in there and still be able to pull it out. Great feature. The pullstrap is knitted fabric so it will last! Great product overall! I carry less junk now but have the essentials..it's thinner so my butt and back don't hurt at end of day!
customer_reviews.author: kevin t webb

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift to my son who said this was perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift to my son who said this was perfect for him. Fits just what he needed - loves the slim size. I had ordered a more expensive one and it just wasn't worth the cost. it also didn't have the clear slot (like for a driver's license). I sent it back and got this one which has the clear slot and was almost half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Small, compact with a lot of GUSTO! Nice leather
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged as received. Beautiful leather. Texas Brown. My wife’s boss said it was worth buying. He was right, for now. Money clip works well. There are enough pockets for credit cards, insurance card, etc. I love the RFID feature so creeps cannot lift your personal information. My license is a little difficult to remove. That might change after a month. Buy it because I SAID SO!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Gator 83

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of wallets, clips, and minimalist wallets and this is BY FAR the best yet. Terrific quality and price and it looks classy. Stop thinking about it and buy it. I have no complaints. I fit 10 credit cards/ID’s plus 5 business cards and 10 bills and it’s not stretched or difficult to close. No more ache in the butt when driving because this forces me to not carry worthless crap that accumulates in the wallet. I wasn’t paid it’s just a good wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Anderson’s

customer_reviews.title: Really like this wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Well designed. Appropriate number of pockets. I don't use the license holder with the window as anyone that needs to see your license will have you remove it from your wallet. I always thought the windows was a silly design idea. However, it a perfect spot to stick small post-its on the window for reminders.
customer_reviews.author: 🤓

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them just as much as I do
customer_reviews.text: This is the third SERMAN BRANDS wallet I've owned this year because my dog ate the first two. Just the wallet...not the cards or cash. I keep buying this wallet though so I must really like it. The cards are hard to fit in the slots at first but the leather stretches a bit over time. I don't see much of a need for the clear plastic since, if asked to see your drivers license...you have to remove it anyway. When you go to remove it you have to bend the wallet back so you can get it by the money clip. I like the idea of the strap that pulls your cards out of another slot.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Slim
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is very good looking and the little ribbon to pull out your favorite card a nice touch. But out of your pocket it just wants to butterfly open with not to many bills in it. Unlike slim wallets with magnets, there's nothing to hold it closed. Also, the drivers license window is a bit to short, so part of your license is under the material. Not very much and probably not an issue. But not perfect. Really, it was the flopping open thing that got to me. I transferred half the stuff from my old slim wallet, checked it out, then transferred back and returned.
customer_reviews.author: SD Wordsmith

customer_reviews.title: This is such a nice transition from his old and bulky wallet
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this wallet. He doesn't typically carry many bills, but has quite a few cards. This is such a nice transition from his old and bulky wallet. The leather is really nice, too! I was a bit worried about the red pull tie on the side looking a bit sophomoric, but you cannot see the red material until you are accessing the hidden cards, and even then, it looks pretty sleek. Overall, he is very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I have used bifold and trifold wallets as long as I have carried a wallet. I got to the point where sitting on them was uncomfortable. I purchased this wallet and absolutely love it. It’s the best wallet I have every owned and when it wears out I will buy another one. It cut the size of my wallet in half l, but I still have all of the original contents.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G.

customer_reviews.title: Leather Ripped Easily.
customer_reviews.text: I like this wallet. I like the design and I like the functionality of it. However, after about 3 weeks of use the seam ripped apart at the leather. It seems like the leather thickness wasn't able to hold up to the use I was giving it. For reference, this tear was at the credit card holder slot. I was carrying about 4 cards, and it probably was the highest use point of the wallet. I have seen friends use theirs for much longer than the 3 weeks I had, maybe bad luck, maybe poor QA, maybe it caught something in my pocket and it's not the manufacturer's fault at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Park

customer_reviews.title: He doesn't have a ton of card or cash he carries so this is perfect. He used to have the tiny little square ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend absolutely loves this wallet I surprised him with for christmas. So hard to find a real leather wallet that isn't tacky or huge. He doesn't have a ton of card or cash he carries so this is perfect. He used to have the tiny little square shaped wallet, but then he got too many cards to even fit in there without the wallet ruining them. So this was a great fit. Plus he loves the little string that pulls the cards out. Very nice. We got the texas brown color. It is absolutely gorgeous. Looks worn it like a nice wallet should.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie N

customer_reviews.title: Great minimalist wallet!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 3/3/19- I still use this wallet daily and as I mentioned the brown residue is no longer an issue. However, the money clip broke just a few months after I purchased the wallet. It would no longer hold tight or tighten back down, everything else has held up extremely well though. Trying to find a replacement piece but no luck so far. This is such a nice wallet, it holds just enough for it to be useful yet minimal. My only complaint so far is it’s turning my most used card brown but I believe that will subside after I break it in more.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: First off, the packaging it arrived in was first class. For as reasonable price this was it packaged as if I spend 200 on a wallet. Deff seems like real leather, perfect size, great function. I would buy another one tomorrow. You absolutely won't be disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe DAlessandro

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I thought.!
customer_reviews.text: This item is presented to be much more thinner than it appears on the computer screen while on Amazon's site. I have other minimalistic wallets that are much more thinner. I guess having the money clip on the inside contributes to the wallet looking thicker. I have not even put in the so called 8 cards that the description mentions but I am sure with all those cards, money bills and that interior clip this wallet will be much more thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: The first "minimalist" wallet that doesn't squeeze your cards in so tight you can't get them out!
customer_reviews.text: There is ample room for the two or three cards pulled up by the convenient strap. There's also room for four more cards, none of which requires you to fight to get them out! The money clip holds ample bills without significantly affecting the thickness of the wallet. No folding your money! This is a great product. I tried four before I settled on this. A magnet or some other closure would help but it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Silver

customer_reviews.title: Ok I absolutely love this wallet
customer_reviews.text: Ok I absolutely love this wallet. But I’m giving it 3 stars because the color of the wallet was rubbing off on my cards. So my white credit card now has weird brown streaks. I had a business card in my pocket with it and the back of it turned almost completely brown. Then, and this is my fault, the money clip pin just disappeared. No idea where, when, or how. My money was still there, but the pin was just gone. Never found it. If I could ensure the pin were set and not going to get lost, and the color issue hadn’t happened, I’d give it 5 stars. Design is just superb, quality I guess is sub par.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a slim wallet for a while now and the Serman Brand wallet really caught my eye. Loved the rustic look, craftsmanship and the convenience features. It truly is a beautiful wallet that will get better over time and use. Only con is the packaging is a bit much (as others have stated). Fits easily and comfortably in my front pocket (or back pocket). At least I won't feel like George Costanza any more! ;) I'm very happy with my purchase and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Betty

customer_reviews.title: Thinnest Real-leather Wallet Ever
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not spend as much as I did for this wallet as I have for others in the past but glad I did. It is all real leather and very well made, quality product. By far the thinnest wallet I have ever had as well. There are point that I forget it is in my pocket or doubt myself having it in my everyday errands. Would highly recommend this wallet and brand. Would buy this wallet again ten times over. The money clip also has a limited replacement warranty as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Hunter

customer_reviews.title: I love this wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year and it's been amazing. It's big enough to fit everything I need but small enough to force me to not carry around a bunch of stuff I don't. I currently have 9 cards plus my drivers license and cash in the wallet. The outer card holder is perfect for your main debit/credit card. It will hold 10+ bills very comfortably but if you put 20 or so in there it will be pretty thick. It has held up well to daily use and when it eventually wears out I will order another one.
customer_reviews.author: trytych

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet for the price.  Held up very well.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this walled going on 3 years now. Its taken a beating for sure. Dropped, washed in washing machine, lost, sat on daily for 3 years. Some of the stitching has started to frey and its scuffed up but it has not effected its functionality. The inside sleeve with the windows has not cracked or broken. The pull strap has not broken and it still retains everything just fine. The money clip slides out easy now but it still performs its job well. I would 100% recommend this wallet if you are looking for this style.
customer_reviews.author: Albanach Olta

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and minimal
customer_reviews.text: Smooth leather with lots of goodies. Has adjustable money clip that is very easy to use. Comes with a 1 yr warranty too which i was surprised by. Outter card holder will take some working to be fluid but really like the overall hold this wallet has. Very Well made. The magic card revealer is fun and already got compliments today on. Bravo guys keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: Midgardexplorer

customer_reviews.title: and it is AMAZING. I would recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet for my boyfriend as an anniversary gift, and it is AMAZING. I would recommend this to anyone. He was thrilled with the wallet and he loves the pull tabs to get your cards out. It makes it very easy when you are in a rush! Every man should have this wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Slim profile wallet that is very well designed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect so far, exactly what I was looking for, small profile with easy access to 3 main cards and then easy access via pull tab to several others. I always had traditional billfold wallets, just too much leather. I tried small 3 card holders, where money goes inside. Cards were easy to access, but money and storing receipts hard. This wallet and the money clip is small and adjustable, making it easy to hold both money and receipts. If this wallet holds up, which I don’t have a reason to think it will not, they have a very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Not enough storage for all the items which are necessary.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this. It does not hold as much as I had hoped. Certain features looked cool on line, but in reality are sort of stupid. I loaded this up with all the cards (insurance, ID, credit) and some money. It was nearly as thick as my current wallet. My current wallet holds more cash than this one does. So I've never used it.
customer_reviews.author: Rog H

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet for me
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this wallet. Carrying around a fat wallet, full of bills and receipts is far in my past. I want something that fits easily in my back or front pocket and will not impede my comfort when sitting. Also, the wallet needs to be functional. I love that this wallet has plenty of slots for insurance cards, window for ID/license, a tabbed/lifting pocket for most used cards, and a slotted pocket with hole to make removal of other frequently used pharmacy/grocery rewards cards easier to access. Have used for two weeks and am quite pleased with the money clip and durability thus far. The fact that it is real leather is a great plus!
customer_reviews.author: Charles A Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet but isn't slim by any means.
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is great for someone who carries around cards and cash but calling this a slim wallet is a bit generous. Without any cards or cash in it, it isn't very slim so any cards you do put in the wallet only add to the size. I do like the wallet and use it, but I just don't believe it's as slim as I was hoping it would be and I don't think I would buy it again. It does everything advertised, except it doesn't have a slim form factor.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: Almost what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Was really hoping this would be the wallet I was wanting. It holds the number of cards I need and I like the cash clip inside. The only thing I don't like is the little tab that pulls up the two credit cards. I don't like it hanging and flopping around. It just gets in the way so I am returning this product and will try to find one without that tab.
customer_reviews.author: Spooker

customer_reviews.title: User friendly, very effective
customer_reviews.text: A front pocket wallet is not only safer but healthier since a rear pocket wallet can cause back issues. Because I travel overseas for business, I've been using a front pocket wallet for over 20 years. This wallet is the most effective I have had in 20 years. It does not use magnets ( which can have a negative effect on credit cards and small electronics). My job requires multiple daily uses of cards in my wallet for security access. This wallet facilitates that better than any other.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: everything i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: i really like this wallet. I've been searching for a replacement for a few years now, and was hesitant about the bulk this would provide due to the money clip and the stitching of the leather. It turns out my concerns were unwarranted. I have been using this wallet for a week now, and love it! In fact, i kept my old (falling apart wallet) because i anticipated needing to revert back to it, but just today, threw it away because I have no intention of going back to it. Will update after more use, should anything change, after I put more wear and tear on it.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Owned for 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this three years ago and have carried it every day. I keep this in my back pocket and is mostly comfortable. Everything has held up just fine. One gripe is having to put my card in backwards otherwise the numbers will become raised up displaying them clearly. The other is that it put a hard bend in my driver's license. It's about time to buy a new wallet and I'm not sure I'll buy this one again. Also I just realized they're marketing this as a rfid blocking wallet. I have scanned my work badge through this on multiple occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Holder

customer_reviews.title: So Far Ok
customer_reviews.text: let me start with for the $$$ i say buy this wallet. now the issues - it is wider than it needs to be. leather has many imperfections and gains more easily. the good - although parts of the leather has issues the leather is thick and feels like it will last. just enough pockets and ways to hold the things i need. Over all a quality product for the money. take out the minor leather flaws and this would cost well over $100.
customer_reviews.author: justin hunchuck

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet for my husband. He has had his old wallet for 10+ years and would cram everything into it. I thought it might be nice for him to try something a bit more slim. He really loves it! I showed it off to his friends at dinner tonight. Good quality and arrived the day after I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a hard sided wallet that just didn’t work out. This one is great and is somewhat flexible hence more comfortable. I like the way this holds currency and the “extraction strap” for frequently used cards! Very happy with it thus far - as long as it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Fury

customer_reviews.title: Not as slim as desired
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't hold as much as I had hoped and isn't much slimmer than a normal wallet. It is accurately described, I just didn't spend enough time looking at options and specifications.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Compact! Classy! Functional. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new wallet and was immediately impressed with the way it was packaged. It would make an excellent gift packed as is. The stitching is impeccable and the quality of leather is as well. I chose Texas Brown and it has a nice vintage style right out of the box. I was able to load it with 6 cards, drivers license, a health care document, and my thin insurance cards, along with some cash and it still lies flat. It would easily fit in a front pocket or suit pocket without being obtrusive. (Unless you wear really tight pants) I love it.
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good wallet
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my birthday and it was perfect: he wanted a wallet with an ID slot, a money clip, and the ability to hold 9+ cards. This wallet does all of that. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 was that the money clip in the center of the bifold kiiinda prevents the wallet from closing flat. Hopefully with daily use, the wallet will start to close flat more. Other than that, it's a superb wallet!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet, slim, practical, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Only had this wallet for 1 week, but so far I love it. I have the Texas brown color - the leather is harder than I expected, but i'm sure it will soften over time with use. It scuffs a little with use, but that's part of the character of the wallet. The sleek, small profile is excellent. Good access to cards. - 1 star because I wish that the pull tab was elastic like in other minimalist wallets. Sometimes you have to push the cards down a little bit further to get the pull tab to sit flush, but overall this feature works well enough, and i like the quick draw access to the cards.
customer_reviews.author: Elroy

customer_reviews.title: Love it, thin and superior accesability
customer_reviews.text: Always been a fan of the ol' money clip, for some reason I've been using a fatter wallet because I'm an "adult" now. Let me tell you, this is what adults use. No bs, I walk up to the bouncer pull the tab and whip my ID out. Now I beat all my friends to the awkward corners of the club #swag. I especially love the front wallet slot, I use this for primary card and It's just so much more convenient. No bifold, just thump up and your card is now in your hand. Love the product, great quality materials for the price too. Sorry for the weird review. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: jb861

customer_reviews.title: Great slim style wallet
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit sceptical of the red pull tab for easy card access at first but have gotten used to it and absolutely love this wallet. I plan to continue using this wallet for years and years to come. I have no plans on ever going back to a bulkier style wallet again. It does hold several bills easily without any issues, but who still uses cash these days anyways? I use this in my front pocket and it works excellently. Glad I gave this brand a chance!
customer_reviews.author: csmith

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: I got the texas brown. Very nice compact wallet for those that do not need to carry a whole lot. Not so sure of the center money clip. So far it is working out all right. Bills are definitely easy access, just visible to all when you open the wallet. Also the rich brown velvet soft leather seems like it could get scratched up easily. Maybe just adding character to an old friend. Does fit very easily into the front pocket of jeans or Dockers. Almost dissapears actually. So for now I go four stars. We will see as to longevity of the product down the road, although I suspect with the qualty this one will last.
customer_reviews.author: RDB

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift
customer_reviews.text: My son says it’s great. I gave it to him for Christmas. I couldn’t believe how thin it is. He always carries his wallet in his front pocket so this one is indeed good for that. If he really likes it, i’ll Get one for my husband who has back problems and be better off not sitting on his wallet. Great service from the company. I would use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Constant Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this wallet a few weeks but I really like it. I was concerned with not have a cash "pocket" like I've always had. But how often do I really use cash, hardly ever. I'm usually using my debit card for purchases. I carry my DL,. LTC, debit card, 1 credit card, 2 insurance cards, and my Costco card. Too big for me for a front pocket. I do put in my jeans back pocket sideways to keep it in place..
customer_reviews.author: James S. of Texas

customer_reviews.title: Secure peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Well made wallet. Smaller than I expected but does the job well. Holds credit, license and business cards securely. I like that it has a pocket on the outside for quick access to non personal items. Very comfortable and slim. Glad I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: PTB

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel of this wallet. Everything fits a snug, though I suspect it will relax a little with time. A little smaller than I wanted, but I was carrying more than I should. There are some pockets on the outside that allow for easy access, but I doubt the cards will ever fall out. I think this will work well for several years.
customer_reviews.author: KS

product_meta.title: SERMAN BRANDS RFID Blocking Slim Bifold Genuine Leather Minimalist Front Pocket Wallets for Men with Money Clip
feature_bullets: PATENTED. 12 MONTH WARRANTY - The SERMAN BRANDS Warranty covers any factory defects as a result from the manufacturing process of the product.

SAFETY. PRIVACY. SECURITY - Our wallets are equipped with advanced RFID SECURE Technology, a unique metal composite, engineered specifically to block 13.56 MHz or higher RFID signals and protect the valuable information stored on RFID chips from unauthorized scans

SLIM AND STYLISH - Made with the Finest Full Grain / Top Grain genuine leather, Designed Quick Access ID Windows, Best Fits 6-8 cards plus US bills with no bulk, and a minimal Pull-tab design to reduce bulk - Wallet Size: 3.9" in. x 2.85" in. 0.5" in.

HOW IT WORKS- At last! A wallet that will meet your everyday needs. The SERMAN BRANDS card holder is equipped with a front pocket made for your most used card. 2 pockets on the inside, with a photo ID slot, and a money clip to hold your cash. Wallet case also has smart pull-strap for quick access to your everyday cards.

LEATHERS- We use only the finest leathers to make smart and stylish wallets! Premium full grain leathers that are soft and appealing! Our vintage leathers stay true to their nature by being receptive to scratches. With use the wallet will absorb the natural oils of your hands which will allow the wallet to develop a rich and dark color. Over time, your wallet will develop a character that matches your adventures.
